title: Fort Matanzas National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search       Event Results  Sorry, but there are no events between 08/14/2016 and 09/13/2016           NPS Photo  Cannon firing dates are canceled until further notice.  Check back here for more information or give us a call at (904) 471-0116 The second Saturday of each month is Living History Day at Fort Matanzas. Re-enactors present cannon firings for all tours except for the 9:30 and 4:30 tours. Check the calendar above for specific dates. Evening Torchlight Tours are presented on one Saturday night in January and February.        NPS Photo  Fort Matanzas National Monument frequently presents ranger or volunteer-led Nature Programs. These programs can vary in physical exertion from a stationary program in the picnic area, a short walk on one of the park's nature trails or a 2 mile hike along the park's beaches.  Check the above calendar for specific details and dates for these programs.         NPS Photo  Bird Walks are usually presented on the second or third Saturday of each month.  Led by a member of the Audubon Society, these walks are from 9:30 to 11:30 and meet at the Fort Matanzas Visitor Center. Check the above calendar for specific dates.
